instructions: Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then tap Wallet & Apple Pay. If you have cards on your other Apple devices, or cards that you recently removed, tap Add next to a card you want to add, then enter the card s CVV. For any other card, tap Add Card, then follow the onscreen instructions.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, tap Wallet & Apple Pay, tap Default Card, then select the card.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, tap Wallet & Apple Pay, then tap the card.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, tap Wallet & Apple Pay, then scroll down to see Transaction Defaults. Tap an item to edit it.
